bug.author: polyaxon-team
bug.summary: Polyaxon cli is breaking if an old cache exists
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
polyaxon project or polyaxon ops breaks if an old exists. <denchmark-h:h3>To reproduce</denchmark-h>
Cache a run or a project and update the CLI. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
polyaxon config purge --cache-only should be triggered automatically.
